metadata.shot_summary: Luxury car drives along grand road, centered vertically, signaling wealth and an impending life shift.

composition.subject_composition: Luxury car centered, vertical leading lines of grand road, forward-facing silhouette.
composition.action: Luxury car moves steadily forward on the grand road.

story_context.era_culture_context: Present-day Indian royal estate approach road

metadata.shot_summary: Car passes under the massive outer gate, gate dominating frame to mark an irreversible threshold.

composition.action: Luxury car drives through the massive outer gate into the estate.

story_context.era_culture_context: Present-day Indian royal estate monumental entrance

metadata.shot_summary: Car glides to a stop outside main palace building, holding stillness to let tension settle.

composition.action: Luxury car slows and stops outside the main palace building exterior.

audio.dialogue: Dekho zyada chipakne ki koshish mat karna... Abhi tak tumne mujhe nahi haraya hai... Wo to baki yoddha tumhe mil kar maar na den isliye maine tumhe select kar liya.... samjhe? Now follow me...
audio.audio_cue_intent: Dialogue sharp and dry; music drops to tension.
